home_page_description: Our platform uses artificial intelligence to recommend books that perfectly match your tastes.
best_experience: We have designed the best possible experience for book lovers
desc_personal_library: Keep track of a list of your favorite books and those you want to read.
desc_ai_recommendations: Quality suggestions based on your preferences and reading habits.
desc_active_community: Engage with other readers and discover their impressions.
placeholder_search: Search for a book, author, genre...
team_description: Meet the literature enthusiasts who created this book recommendation platform to help you find your next favorite read.
contact_description: Do you have any questions or suggestions? Feel free to contact us!

team.bio_stefan: Stéfan is responsible for managing the team and the overall strategy of the platform. His goal is to ensure that everything runs smoothly and that users have a seamless experience.
team.bio_diane: Diane manages the architecture and administration of databases, ensuring optimal organization of information for quick and secure access to books and user data.
team.bio_ethan: Ethan is in charge of front-end and back-end development of the platform, making sure that the application's features are efficient and tailored to user needs.
team.bio_benjamin: Benjamin works on the entire technical development of the platform, optimizing existing features and adding new ones to improve user experience.
team.bio_esteban: Esteban uses artificial intelligence and data analysis techniques to personalize book recommendations and improve the suggestion algorithm based on user preferences.
team.bio_pierig: Pierig is responsible for managing the server-side of the platform, optimizing performance and data security while ensuring the database runs reliably and quickly.
team.bio_samuel: Samuel takes care of system administration and IT infrastructure, ensuring stability, security, and performance of the platform's servers.

footer_title: Your smart platform for book recommendations
connexion_description: Log in to access your account and discover personalized book recommendations.
register_description: Register to access your account and discover personalized book recommendations.
connexion_password_contrainsts: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
connexion_number_books_read_by_year: Number of books read per year

prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
prerequisites.description: Before starting, make sure you have the following installed on your computer:

step2.title: 2. Verify Docker installation
step2.description: Make sure Docker is properly installed:

options: Linux: Use your package manager (apt, dnf, pacman)

step3.title: 3. Start the project
step3.note: The -p option populates the database with initial data.

access.title: Accessing the Application
access.description: Once the project is started, you can access the application:

commands.title: Useful Commands
commands.list:
# Stop the application
./stop_project

# Restart without resetting the database
./start_project

# View logs
docker-compose logs -f

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
list: Make sure the necessary ports (5173, 8000) are not already in use
